headline.main: NAZIS NEAR VOLGA; Spearhead Is Within 15 Miles of Stalingrad, Enemy Reports

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Tuesday, Sept. 1 -- A new German wedge has been driven into Soviet positions southwest of Stalingrad, but the Red Army has continued to gain in a thrust against the enemy flank to the northwest, near Kletskaya, after overwhelming Italian forces, the Russian High Command announced today.
abstract: USSR admits Ger wedge in positions southwest of Stalingrad; Itals defeated, Kletskaya area; troops and war materiel taken by USSR forces; Gers say wedge is within 15 mi of Stalingrad; USSR forces hold, Caucasus; USSR Rzhev drive gains; Gers claim Ger-Rumanian troops continue advance toward Black Sea; map
